4314200.name: Flap de Clap Demo
4314200.description:
Flap through obstacles and clap enemies to bump up your highscore in this fast paced action endless runner!

A classic, reimagined

Flap through different worlds while dodging various obstacles, fearsome, yet kinda cute, enemies, collect yummy sweats and defeat bosses!

Do all this not just by flapping but also moving and dashing. Defeat enemies by clapping them with your stinger, earning you more points (and stealing their coins. It's fine, they where super evil).

Infinite levels, many different worlds, one goal: Getting the highest score possible!

Take on the challenge

Once you feel skilled enough you can take on Mount Snoepje, the famous and dangerous mountain. Legend says a huge stach of candy awaits the bee who manages to scale it first!

Play together with your friends

Fly up Mount Snoepje alone or together with up to three friends in local and online co-op!
Let's just hope your friendships survives that challenge.

Unlock new characters and skins, defeat enemies to unlock their Encyclopedia entry and compete against players from all over the world in a huge highscore hunt!
4314200.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
